title: cant use special ability
body: Hello. I started to play with Galio, but i can't use special ability (R), Why? What am I doing wrong?

replies.body: I can't really say for sure.  :/  Are you selecting an ally's position?  Test his ult out in a bot game.  If you run into any issues or can duplicate a possible bug, make sure to[ report it](https://pbr.leagueoflegends.com/na/en_US/bugReport/create)!  I hope that helps!
